string.value: A #p9000043# that has been separated from his flock is looking for help...

A snipe that was migrating to a warmer place got lost and is now separated from his flock. He wants to fly towards his friends but he can only take off by jumping off the #bJump Stand#k... To help the Snipe, talk to him using the keyword #bHelp the Snipe#k.
You helped the Snipe get up the branch. He should now be able to jump and take off. But why do you feel so uneasy...

Hello! The sun is radiant and the eggs are growing nicely...it sure is a nice day isn't it? But why do I look so depressed, you ask? It's because the warm weather led me to fly into Maple World, and now I am lost. I don't know where my friends went... I wonder where they must have flown to by now... What? Why don't I just follow after them?

Well, I would like to! But...I can't. The truth is, I'm not really that great at flying yet. Of course, I know the basics. But my wings just aren't that strong! If I can descend from greater heights, I'm sure I'd be able to fly all I want!

But going to a high place isn't that easy. In order to climb up high on the tree branches, I have to jump over monsters, but I'm afraid of both jumping and monsters! Say, do you think you could lend me a hand?
Ah, thank you so much! Talk to me using the keyword, #bHelp the Lost Snipe#k.
Oh, I see. Does that mean I'm stuck here forever...?
I'm... I'm so sorry! You went out of your way to help me, but I failed to jump. Wahhhh! What am I going to do? At this rate, I'll never catch up to my friends!
*Sniff sniff* Oh, how I would love to go to the platform one more time. I think I'd be able to fly successfully this time...
